items.title: First Time Leaders: set the right foundations!
items.headline: Very first weeks into the job
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to handle themselves when they first step into this role; how to conduct successful meetings, how to prepare for them, how to be confident as a leader, how to lead effectively so that you get a productive team. At the end of the course, you should be able to confidently lead a whole group of people who are multicultural, senior, unproductive, highly productive, talented. You should be able to rectify any negative situation by applying the right methodology and having the right attitude.

items.title: Facilitating Meetings and Groups

visible_instructors.title: LearnSmart LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Smarter Training. Never Open a Textbook.
visible_instructors.name: LearnSmart

items.headline: Everything you need to know about facilitating meetings and groups.
objectives_summary: Upon completion of this course, you will be able to organize and lead meetings efficiently and successfully.
he course will teach you how to engage the group, get them to cooperate and productively achieve the goals that had been set for the meeting.
At same time, you will learn how to manage your time effectively.
